execution_plan.description: Find the goods ids for products that are cakes with lemon flavor.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE food = 'cake' AND flavor = 'lemon';

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers from the items table that reference the goods ids found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get distinct customer IDs from receipts for the receipts found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt) AND CustomerId IS NOT NULL;
